A creature that slays the deific vessel is visibly marked as anathema to Urgathoa. It gains weakness 10 to unholy and takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty to Charisma-based skill checks against followers of Urgathoa. Creatures attempting to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Gather Information] about or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Track] the marked creature gain a +2 circumstance bonus to their checks.

The mark can't be hidden and can be removed only by participating in an atone ritual led by a worshipper of Urgathoa who is 12th level or higher.
